mapper.select: select t.now_route_node as nowRouteNode, (select m.node_name from node_info m where t.now_route_node = m.node_code limit 1) as nowRouteName, t.next_route_node as nextRouteNode, (select n.node_name from node_info n where t.next_route_node = n.node_code limit 1) as nextRouteName from sys_call_rela t
select ni.node_name from sys_call_rela scr left join node_info ni on scr.now_route_node=ni.node_code where scr.yn=0 and ni.node_name is not null
select count(*) from trade_detail where zt = 0 and mbxt=#{sysname}
select count(*) from trade_detail where zt = 1 and mbxt=#{sysname}
